column1: [Highlight] Marcus Smart denies Garrett Temple on the fast break
[Woj] Kansas guard Marcus Garrett is signing a two-way deal with the Miami Heat, his agent Mike George tells ESPN. Garrett honored his college rep as a tenacious defender in summer league.
[Winderman] Miami Heat sign Ron Artest (as in his son, for their G-league team); Marcus Garrett sent to Sioux Falls.
